title: Almost Was EP (Mp4) Sexor Suicide - Zeppelin Sabbath Metal Rock
description:
Sexor Suicide was a Hard Rock - Classic Rock - and occasional Heavy Metal band that gigged locally around New York City in 2006-2007.  Despite early success, conflicts lead to the band splitting up while recording their debut album.

Here are almost all the studio tracks the band recorded in 2007.  Their sound is a mix of Led Zeppelin, Black Sabbath, Deep Purple, and Jimi Hendrix.

The music was recorded by John Gallagher and produced by John Gallagher and Jonathan Schlackman.

Sexor Suicide (the band that almost was):
Ribal Rayess - vocals
Anthony Sgaraglio - drums
John Gallagher - bass
Jonathan Schlackman - guitar

No love songs here. Just agressive satisfying Rock from the NYC Underground. Besides some really good riffs and grooves, what made Sexor Suicide stand out was the guitar playing of Jonathan Schlackman- one of the finest unknown players to ever come out of the Big Apple.
